CareOne Charcoal Deep Cleansing Pore Strips

Brand: Care One

Category: Pore Strips

Ingredients: VP/NA COPOLYMER, WATER, IRON OXIDES (CI 77499), 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, LITHIUM MAGNESIUM SODIUM SILICATE, GLYCERIN, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, ILLICIUM VERUM (ANISE) FRUIT EXTRACT, CHARCOAL POWDER, SILICA, AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE/VP COPOLYMER, MENTHOL, SCUTELLARIA BAICALENSIS ROOT EXTRACT, HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL)

ILLICIUM VERUM (ANISE) FRUIT EXTRACT, CHARCOAL POWDER, SILICA, AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE/VP COPOLYMER, MENTHOL, SCUTELLARIA BAICALENSIS ROOT EXTRACT, HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL) EXTRACT, PEG-12 DIMETHICONE, PEG 12 ALLYL ETHER, T-BUTYL ALCOHOL.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
